chapters.title: Chapter 48: Reading the Commentary
chapters.info: Karldin Manfor, p. 745—Asha'man Soldier who accompanied Loial to all the stedding and former Ogier groves to seal the Waygates there or warn others to monitor them. Like Flinn and Narishma, he was on the Deserter's List, as was every Asha'man that works with Rand. He has since been removed from the list. He accompanied Bashere to negotiate with Suroth. He is now bound as a Warder to Beldeine. See also Nyram, Beldeine.
